version_description:
• Content now looks more stylish on iOS 9
• New help section
• Minor stability and perfomance improvements
• Bug fixes
• More training courses are coming!

Meet the new iPad version design!
We have also significantly modified iPhone version design, with the completely new lesson control panel.
Also, you now have the option to unlock all the content at once.

Now you can access more than 100 courses for a week free of charge! Try now and let us know what you think!

Also updated:
• Designed for iOS 11
• Over 20 new courses, containing more than 1000 tutorials, tips and tricks
• Stability improvements and minor bug fixes

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

We've adapted our app for your new iPhone X.
Also this update contains fixes for known bugs and some minor stability and performance improvements.
